data.text: Eka Bildad ja-Shua nodwoko kama:
“Ibiro dhi nyime kiwacho gik ma kamago nyaka karangʼo?
Bende Nyasaye nyalo ngʼado bura ma ok nikare?
Kane nyithindi otimo richo e nyime,
To ka inyalo dok ir Nyasaye
kata ka dine in ngʼama ler kendo ngimani oriere tir,
Kata obedo ni chakruok mari ne rachrach,
“Penj ane tiengʼ mosekalo
nikech wan to nyoro eka nonywolwa,
We ipuonjri rieko kuom joma chon
Bende togo nyalo dongo marabora kama thidhna ongee?
Kapod gidongo maber kendo pod ok ongʼolgi oko,
Mano e gima timore ne joma oweyo Nyasaye;
Gima ogeno kuome en gima nono;
Koro ka giyiengore e mbuyi,
Ochalo gi yien motwi kama otimo pi to chiengʼ goyo
tiendene olawore e lwendni,
To ka opudhe oko kama otweyeno,
Ngimane ner mi rum adier,
“Adier, Nyasaye ok kwed ngʼama onge ketho,
Obiro miyo ichako inyiero
Wasiki biro rwako wichkuot ka law,
